channel.title: Combined git log
channel.description:
Hi,
I was regularly checking the github page for latest improvements but since the packages are getting splitted, there doesn't seem to be any activity on main github repo,
I'm sure I can manually look for each package page but it would be better if it's possible to see combined changelog in one place, this is not about the release logs but for following recent/live changes.
This would also better show the project activity to anyone

item.title: Combined git log
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There is no progress in the main repo at the moment, because I am working on:
https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues/40
Soon there will be a lot activity.

Any idea how to technically implement the combined git log?

See also:

Whonix – 9 Aug 19

Dev/git - Whonix

Development Notes about git and ways to stay up to date of source code changes

I think in future, adding all packages you’re interested in to rss could do the trick?

Read full topic
